channel.title: travel, technology on Dude
channel.description: Recent content in travel, technology on Dude

item.title: For my students: starting off 2019
item.description: Tech things I saw traveling to Japan Since I intend this to be more of a ‘notes to self’ journal than a personal blog I'm not going to go into a lot of details about the terrific experience my wife and I had while traveling to Japan at the end of 2018. It was beautiful and rewarding, so let's just leave it at that. What I would like to do is post a few observations about technology from the trip.
